channel.title: Law of Two Feet on Zinzy's website
channel.description: Recent content in Law of Two Feet on Zinzy's website

item.title: Week 1: Miracle mornings
item.description: A somewhat quiet week, mostly spent at the office because Anja’s on winter break, although I did enjoy spending time at Coffee Company Oosterdok as well. Working without my regular laptop stand and wireless keyboard and trackpad doesn’t feel great for my body, but they make great coffee. I seem to have found my way back to the [[Miracle morning|Miracle morning]] method. While I cringe at the very notion of self development, it has been great to start my day in quietude.
